title: Why does battery state say 75% on shutdown, but states 25% on reboot?
content: Like last night I shut down my phone and it was was showing 75% charge, when I reboot it the following morning it shows 25% this does not always do this but when it does it's usually a large difference, too much I suspect to be hardware, and when I plug it in it will offer jusmp back to close to what it was say 75%
